title: 1.15.2服务端陆续报出警告随后崩溃
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1191854019 于 2020-7-13 14:37 编辑 

从昨晚11点开始，TPS就从20一点点开始掉，到凌晨5点左右接近10了，中午12点崩溃。凌晨期间几乎没有玩家在线，应该不是玩家的问题。

整个过程一直在报出这样的警告：[00:47:32] [Paper RegionFile IO Thread/WARN]: Saving oversized chunk [3, 6] (1793750 bytes} to external file .\world\region\c.3.6.mcc
[00:52:32] [Paper RegionFile IO Thread/WARN]: Saving oversized chunk [3, 6] (1842608 bytes} to external file .\world\region\c.3.6.mcc
[00:57:32] [Paper RegionFile IO Thread/WARN]: Saving oversized chunk [3, 6] (1891330 bytes} to external file .\world\region\c.3.6.mcc
[01:02:32] [Paper RegionFile IO Thread/WARN]: Saving oversized chunk [3, 6] (1939219 bytes} to external file .\world\region\c.3.6.mcc
[01:07:32] [Paper RegionFile IO Thread/WARN]: Saving oversized chunk [3, 6] (1987417 bytes} to external file .\world\region\c.3.6.mcc
[01:12:32] [Paper RegionFile IO Thread/WARN]: Saving oversized chunk [3, 6] (2036439 bytes} to external file .\world\region\c.3.6.mcc复制代码
最后的报错信息：
[10:49:03] [Server thread/INFO]: [SAML] TPS low (9.34). Will attempt to freeze some mobs...
[10:49:04] [Paper RegionFile IO Thread/WARN]: Saving oversized chunk [3, 6] (4411815 bytes} to external file .\world\region\c.3.6.mcc
[12:06:44] [Server thread/INFO]: [SAML] TPS low (8.97). Will attempt to freeze some mobs...
[12:06:44] [Server thread/INFO]: [SAML] 43 mobs affected (43 frozen, 0 nerfed) in 216ms. Total of 533/967 affected (533 frozen, 132 nerfed).
[12:06:45] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Is the server overloaded? Running 36987ms or 739 ticks behind
[12:07:52] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Is the server overloaded? Running 37753ms or 755 ticks behind
[12:09:01] [Async Chat Thread - #56/INFO]: <adhesive_tape> 卡了

replies.author: WritePaperLZ
replies.txt_content:
找不到来源(?
可以试试 重新安装 JAVA
重新安装 Minecraft Server
重新安装 插件

replies.author: 玄冥不倒翁
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 602269287 于 2020-7-13 14:42 编辑 

因为冻结小怪，服务器过载了。。。你野外怪物的配置是怎么样的~43 mobs affected (43 frozen, 0 nerfed) in 216ms. Total of 533/967 affected (533 frozen, 132 nerfed).
有什么冰冻伤害和火焰伤害的mod吗？？我觉得应该是有人炸服~

602269287 发表于 2020-7-13 14:38
因为冻结小怪，服务器过载了。。。你野外怪物的配置是怎么样的~43 mobs affected (43 frozen, 0 nerfed) in ...
那个是SAML的冻结插件 tps低于18会自动冻结实体的 设置中有把生物生成上限改小 应该不是实体的问题 感觉是区块写入时出错了
